model.graph

Class Graph

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.graph.Graph
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Graph model class is where all the underlying functionality is to set up the graphs and adjust the curves
    Author:
    erikowen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • applyStandardCurve

        public void applyStandardCurve(java.lang.String curveString)
                        throws BadDataException
        Applies an evenly distributed curve to all the grades that are in the graph's data.
        Parameters:
        curveAmount - the percent curve that the grades will be adjusted by.
        Throws:
        BadDataException

      • getAssignmentBarChartData

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getAssignmentBarChartData(java.lang.String granularity)
        Accessor method to get the scores used in the bar chart graph
        Parameters:
        granularity - either 1% or 10% interval granularity
        Returns:
        a Map of the range (as a string) to an integer of the number of students in that range.

      • getAssignmentPieChartData

        Accessor method to get the data to initialize the pie chart graph
        Returns:
        a map with a string representing the letter grade to the number of students in that letter grade range.
